text: The Polynin Case () is a 1970 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksey Sakharov.Центр культуры «Рекорд» подготовил праздничную программу ко Дню победыСлучай с Полыниным It stars Anastasiya Vertinskaya, Oleg Efremov, and Oleg Tabakov. == Actors == * Anastasiya Vertinskaya * Oleg Efremov * Oleg Tabakov as Viktor Balakirev * Georgiy Burkov * Bella Manyakina * Nonna Mordyukova * Aleksandr Khanov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1970 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Polynin Case
